meanings.definition: A large New World vulture with a bare head and mainly black plumage, living in mountainous regions.
meanings.sent1: The condor soared high above the mountains.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a condor gliding gracefully through the sky.
meanings.sent3: The condor decided to take a break and rest on a mountain peak.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was as free as a condor in flight.
meanings.sent5: The majestic condor's wingspan was truly impressive.
